result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Backman, Stephen A

records.addlTxt: Detainer lift faxed to Marinette County Jail
Detainer placed with Marinette County Jail - signature bond previously faxed not returned.
Signed bond received from Marinette County Jail on 11/1/22.
Preliminary hearing on December 14, 2022 at 10:15 am.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing. Defendant to have no contact with Superstar Buds/Christopher S. listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant is not to use/possess any drug paraphernalia.

2:32 PM Defendant Stephen A Backman, in custody, appeared by video from Marinette County Jail.  Attorney Jeffrey Jensen Jr for attorney Ricardo Tapia in court for Stephen A Backman.  Prosecuting attorney Alyssa M Jay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint. Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  Defendant has a sentencing date set for December 20, 2022 in Marinette County.  Preliminary Hearing requested. Preliminary time limits waived.  Clerk of Courts Office to prepare Order to Produce from Marinette County Jail.  If this matter will be a waiver, Attorney Tapia to inform the Clerks office so the OTP can be cancelled an a video appearance set up.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Initial appearance on October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Stephen A Backman
Current: c/o Marinette County Jail, 2161 University Drive, Marinette, WI 54143 United States  (Effective: 10-13-2022)
Prior: 75 Morgan St, Marinette, WI 54143

Letter filed by Atty Tapia requesting Zoom.**Reviewed by Commissioner David Herring on 10/14 "Adjourn and find a date that works with Counsels schedule within 30 days. The court notes there are no Victim issues presented."
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
